messages.content: What is the purpose of the nodes created by GraftingRayman?
The nodes created by GraftingRayman are designed to make image generation and manipulation tasks easier and faster in ComfyUI.
How can you install the ComfyUI_GraftingRayman nodes?

You can install the ComfyUI_GraftingRayman nodes using ComfyUI Manager or by manually cloning the GitHub repository into your custom_nodes directory using the command: 'git clone https://github.com/GraftingRayman/ComfyUI_GraftingRayman'.
What is the GR Text Overlay node used for?
The GR Text Overlay node is used to create text overlays on images, with options for placement, justification, colors, fonts, and more.
What does the GR Prompt Selector node do?
The GR Prompt Selector node allows users to choose from 6 prompts, including an always-on prompt and a negative prompt.
How does the GR Image Resizer node function?
The GR Image Resizer node resizes images based on height and size, and was created with credit to simeonovich.
What is the purpose of the GR Mask Create node?
The GR Mask Create node creates a single mask that can be used in image manipulation tasks.
How does the GR Counter node work?

The GR Counter node creates a countdown or count up timer video with customizable font, size, outline, and positioning options. The output frames can be further processed and saved as an MP4 video file.
What is the function of the GR Background Remover REMBG node?
The GR Background Remover REMBG node is an updated version of other REMBG nodes that includes all available REMBG models to choose from for removing backgrounds from images.
